organism.translation[0].definitions[0].d: an animal, plant, human, or any other living thing
organism.translation[0].definitions[0].e: All living organisms have to adapt to changes in environmental conditions.
Genes operate together in determining the characteristics of an individual organism.
organism.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a system made up of parts that are dependent on each other
organism.translation[0].definitions[1].e: A society is essentially an organism.
